metadata.title: CVE-2018-19664 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
libjpeg-turbo 2.0.1 has a heap-based buffer over-read in the put_pixel_rowsfunction in wrbmp.c, as demonstrated by djpeg.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19664` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjpeg-turbo-progs - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.1
libjpeg-turbo-test - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.1
libjpeg-turbo8 - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.1
libturbojpeg - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.2-0ubuntu5.18.04.1').
